medium: Pen and ink and graphite on card
title: Crooked Man
marks:
Inscription

on back, URC, in pencil: [27]
description: image illustrating \"Crooked Man\" nursery rhyme; thin, stooped man wearing a tall black wooly cap and knickers, walking with a crooked cane; cat catching a mouse in front of man on path; crooked house in background, ULC, with twisting chimney; numbers in pencil (\"1 / 2 / 3 / Sky 4\") at right edge next to image
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
